message.entry: The prediction and ground-truth data must have equal lengths.
Mismatched categories. Prediction and ground-truth labels must have the same categories.
Prediction and ground-truth labels must have at least one category.
Object area ranges must be either an M-by-2 matrix or a vector.
The lower limit of each area range must be smaller than the upper limit.
'ClassNames' must be classes present in the metrics.
'OverlapThresholds' must be thresholds present in the metrics.
AOS metrics are only available in the summary if specified during evaluation.
LAMR metrics are only available in the summary if specified during evaluation.
